page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Storage
incidents.message: Start Time : 26/03/2024 02:36 UTC End Time : 26/03/2024 09:05 UTC User impact : The backup and restore services for some customers who have the feature Veeam backup managed in RBX8 are currently unavailable. Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2 Root cause : Cooling system issue Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
